oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Kenny Rogers Live at the Belmont Park - 1978-09-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from Belmont Park live show. The tape features a live performance of Kenny Rogers. (musician). The Belmont Park live show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Kenny Rogers is from September 03, 1978.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kenny Rogers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Heart to Heart [featuring an unidentified host] [incomplete] (Kenny Rogers) -- (01:57) Heart to Heart [featuring an unidentified host] (Kenny Rogers) -- (04:20) Me and Bobby McGee (Kenny Rogers) -- (06:51) Kenny Rogers reveals that the show is being recorded and his reasons for musical hesitation -- (09:17) Love or Something Like it (Kenny Rogers) -- (12:18) Something's Burning (Kenny Rogers) -- (16:21) Reuben James (Kenny Rogers) -- (19:08) Oh Lady Luck (Kenny Rogers) -- (22:26) Rogers reflects on his opportunity to discover Don Henley -- (23:02) Desperado (Kenny Rogers) -- (26:55) Daytime Friends (Kenny Rogers) -- (30:34) Morgana Jones (Kenny Rogers) -- (34:56) Sweet Music Man (Kenny Rogers) -- (39:08) Lucille (Kenny Rogers) -- (44:51) Ruby (Kenny Rogers) -- (48:13) An unidentified host performs the WHN closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rogers, Kenny;
